teams.name: Accidental Entrepreneurs
teams.loan_because: We want to share the spirit of creative entrepreneuring with others.
teams.description: Self-employed creative professionals who love life, beauty, and possibility.

teams.name: Oxfam at Virginia Tech
teams.loan_because: We can't stand idle and watch people suffer while we live in affluence and others live in poverty.
teams.description: We are a collection of college activists who are tired of seeing inequality across the globe.

teams.name: women empowering women
teams.loan_because: empower a woman, change the world.

teams.name: Family Giving
teams.loan_because: We care.

teams.name: Animal Lovers
teams.loan_because: Even as animals living in a developed country - we are better off  than humans in many parts of the world.
teams.description: We are animal lovers who want to help those less fortunate in the poor areas of the world.

teams.name: Thailand
teams.loan_because:
We are the fortunate in this world that have the ability to help the working poor rise from poverty and perhaps enjoy a bit of happiness in their lives. 

With Kiva members' help these brothers and sisters, our fellow humans, have been given a ray of hope that only they can build upon for a brighter future.
teams.description: We have a very passionate core group of members who make consistent loans.  Join us today and set Thailand as your team choice.   Let's live up to the slogan "Amazing Thailand" with our generous lending activities.

teams.name: Smile City Dental
teams.loan_because: It is our mission to make the world smile! Helping people in need and empowering them with self-sufficiency is a small step towards achieving that goal.
teams.description: A group of dentists, staff, family, and friends that truly care about helping out those who need a lending hand.

teams.name: Nerdfighters
teams.loan_because:
We aim to decrease world suck.

And this is how:
www.eludehcs.no/kiva/nerdfighters/nerdfighters20120916.png by Nerdfighter Ole Bendik
teams.description:
We're Nerdfighters! We fight against suck; we fight for awesome! We fight using our brains, our hearts, our calculators, and our trombones.

Happy lending!

Follow us on twitter: https://twitter.com/KivaNerds

teams.name: Rotary Club of Arlington Heights
teams.loan_because: The members of our Rotary club understand the power of credit to people who can't get conventional loans.
teams.description: We are trying to make a difference to people in need whom we may never get a chance to meet.

teams.name: Building Learning Communities
teams.loan_because: We can make a difference and bring "meaning" to the classroom.
teams.description:
In 2008, Alan invited Jessica Flannery, the co-founder of Kiva, to present at BLC. Jessica told a very touching story of why she wanted to help the working poor. Since that time, the Building Learning Communitiesâ€™ team has loaned $10.385.00 to struggling entrepreneurs around the world. We would like to invite you to help grow our team and have even more impact.

Kiva is a non-profit website that allows you to lend as little as $25 to a specific low-income entrepreneurs around the world. You choose who to lend to - whether a baker in Afghanistan, a goat herder in Uganda, a farmer in Peru, a restaurateur in Cambodia or a tailor in Iraq - and as they repay the loan, you get your money back. 

By joining our lending team, we can work together to alleviate poverty.

teams.name: Freemasons
teams.loan_because: Faith, Hope, and Charity are our basic beliefs.
teams.description: Freemasons making a difference in the world.  Members of the world's oldest fraternity putting into practice the charity we discuss in our lodges.

teams.name: Kiva Christians
teams.loan_because:
Pure and undefiled religion before God the Father is this: to care for orphans and widows in their misfortune and to keep oneself unstained by the world. (Jam. 1:27) http://whoisjesus-really.com/

Link to information regarding Christian partners       
http://goo.gl/LU3hzz
teams.description: A group of believers in Jesus Christ, brought together through a common purpose: to help those in need around the world.

teams.name: Lucky Thirteen Lenders
teams.loan_because: Give a person a fish and he will eat for a day, teach him how to fish and he will eat for a lifetime.
teams.description: Friends and Family of Bev and Rich Worford

teams.name: Crazy Canucks
teams.loan_because: We live in a well-to-do nation and want to help those less fortunate than ourselves
teams.description: We are CANADIAN !!!

teams.name: The Millers
teams.loan_because: We hope to restitch God's Shalom.
teams.description: A family.

teams.name: Friends of Bob Harris
teams.loan_because:
After stumbling into a job as a luxury travel writer, I saw so much poverty that I decided to turn those paychecks into Kiva loans. Then I visited a bunch of clients, who were amazing, and I've written a book about it called "The International Bank of Bob" (Walker/Bloomsbury, March 5, 2013).

I hope the book will get more people to feel a greater understanding of Kiva, a better appreciation of the role of microfinance, and most of all, more connected to the rest of the world.
teams.description: People who realize that if we switched places with the recipients, they'd loan to us just as happily.  So, fair's fair.

teams.name: Dalat - Vietnam
teams.loan_because: It's a way of paying back what we have owed.
teams.description: We have been helped to succeed; we want you to succeed too.

teams.name: Team CANADA
teams.loan_because:
So little means so much. And because we are so fortunate to be able to lend with the luxury of not worrying about whether we ever see that money again, while the clients borrow with the hope and determination that they will be able to repay, and improve their lives along the way.

Check out fundraising loans already being supported by Team Canada:
http://www.kiva.org/team/team_canada/loans?status=fundRaising
teams.description: We're Canadian, eh?

teams.name: Kiva San Francisco
teams.loan_because: a little goes a long way.

teams.name: Kiva Team Germany
teams.loan_because: Showing interest in the life of others and giving a helping hand if needed is important.
teams.description: We are some fellows from Germany who believe in the concept of Kiva.

teams.name: Ivy T Matsikidze Team(Rosemary Matsikidze) facilitator
teams.loan_because: Because it feels good inside to be able to help our fellow humans.
teams.description: A team of Caring, Loving, Compassionate, people who do not want to leave others behind. With a burning desire to help them achieve their dreams as well as their life purpose.

teams.name: FOUNDations
teams.loan_because: we've raised $900 to loan and re-loan to help hard-working people in developing countries have a better life.
teams.description: We are a group of friends based in NYC. Two of us found $69 cash on the street in June 2008.  We started a fundraising group called FOUNDations and raised $900 for Kiva (and a total of $1300).

teams.name: Columbia University
teams.loan_because: We want to encourage entrepreneurship
teams.description: Students and alumni of Columbia University.

teams.name: NYC
teams.loan_because: the greatest city in the world should do it's part to help end poverty.
teams.description:
You can lend money through our team in two ways:
  • Lend money through Kiva and then at checkout count it towards the NYC team
  • Send a gift certificate to nyc.kiva.endowment@gmail.com This is our city's Kiva endowment. 100% of the money will be loaned out. This is a long-term Kiva account that is linked to the NYC Kiva lending page. As loans get repaid, the money will be recycled and reloaned. This is a great way to make a larger impact and to make our teamâ€™s presence more permanent.
    • In the spirit of Kiva, this endowment will be 100% transparent. Whenever you give money please tell us how you would like to be identified on our public google spreadsheet. You can see who is receiving money by looking at the endowment's lender page.

teams.name: Kiva Philadelphia
teams.loan_because: We believe in the power of empower.
teams.description: Kiva Philly was born in 2007, and has grown considerably over the years.

teams.name: New York
teams.loan_because: New York is full of entrepreneurs so we want to support others around the world, and give them the opportunity to alleviate themselves out of poverty.
teams.description:
We are a group of like minded New Yorkers who connect to make a difference.

Please note, Team Message unrelated to Kiva New York team lending & activities may be deleted.  Please keep posts related to the team!

http://gplus.to/kivany

teams.name: Unitarian Universalists
teams.loan_because:
We believe in:
**The inherent worth and dignity of every person
**Justice, equity and compassion in human relations
**Acceptance of one another and encouragement to spiritual growth in our congregations
**A free and responsible search for truth and meaning
**The right of conscience and the use of the democratic process within our congregations and in society at large
**The goal of world community with peace, liberty, and justice for all
**Respect for the interdependent web of all existence of which we are a part.
teams.description:
We are UU congregations and individuals (including those who describe themselves as "active" or "backslid" or "interested friends" or "just looking") throughout the world. 
For more information on us, or to find a congregation near you, check out the main website for the Unitarian Universalist Association

teams.loan_because: We are out and proud and know what it is like to face barriers. We are privileged to help our entrepreneurs achieve their own equality. We thank our friends who join us in our loans & in supporting GLBT rights.

teams.name: Musicians for a Cause
teams.loan_because: As Winston Churchill said, "We make a living by what we do, but we make a life by what we give". Our simple idea is that instead of giving someone a  present for their birthday or Christmas, you should give a Kiva gift certificate and let them feel the joy in changing a life. They'll be hooked and you'll forever change the way they look at what the true spirit of giving means.
teams.description: As Winston Churchill said, "We make a living by what we do, but we make a life by what we give". Our simple idea is that instead of giving someone a  present for their birthday or Christmas, you should give a Kiva gift certificate and let them feel the joy in changing a life. They'll be hooked and you'll forever change the way they look at what the true spirit of giving means.

teams.name: Calgary, Canada
teams.loan_because: Living in such a great city as Calgary with all the opportunities that entails, surely we can make an effort to help others less fortunate. We all can make a big difference with just a small loan.
teams.description:
This team is for residents of Calgary, former residents, people wtih friends and family here or for anyone who really loves the city!

To those who do not wish to receive an email when messages are posted to the board, there is a simple fix: Go to your portfolio, then your account, then email preferences and you can disable/enable from there. I myself have turned it off as I am a member of several groups and do not want to receive masses of emails.

teams.name: Jake's Bar Mitzvah Team
teams.loan_because: we are helping to tikkun olam (repair the world in Hebrew).
teams.description: My friends and family are supporting me to make the world a better place, and what better way to do that than to have funds that keep giving back so I can help through my whole lifetime.

teams.name: Team Obama
teams.loan_because: We understand that our combined efforts through Kiva will help make this world a much better place!
teams.description: http://www.npr.org/templates/story/story.php?storyId=127545645

teams.name: Maria Shriver + A Woman's Nation
teams.loan_because: For as little as $25, we can help women entrepreneurs right in our own backyard.
teams.description:
Continuing what she began as First Lady of California, Maria Shriver and A Womanâ€™s Nation are partnering with Kiva, the world's first person-to-person microlending website, to empower thousands of women across America to become more financially independent. Our partnership shows that every loan you make to a woman entrepreneur â€“ even $25 â€“ will make a real difference. 

As "The Shriver Report: A Womanâ€™s Nation Pushes Back from the Brink"* states, 1 in 3 American women lives on or near the brink of poverty. By starting or expanding her own business, a woman can lift herself and her family off the brink. JOIN US in moving women and families forward!

A Womanâ€™s Nationâ„¢ is a nonprofit organization founded by Maria Shriver that imagines a new way forward for women and men, girls and boys. Through its multimedia initiatives and innovative partnerships, A Woman's Nation informs, inspires, and implements bold ideas into action with the goal of creating a culture where all lives and all work are respected, recognized, and valued. To learn more please visit AWomansNation.org.
 
* A project of A Woman's Nation, produced in partnership with Center for American Progress.

teams.loan_because: We are globally minded and wish to make a direct impact on the lives of others. By helping to empower others we empower ourselves.
teams.description: A collective group of hard working, creative people who want to take the extra step in assisting others fulfill their dreams. We have all had a helping hand or words of support from past mentors and now we can work as a team to pass on some inspiration.

teams.name: Sideroff's Ocean View
teams.loan_because: it's simply the right thing to do.
teams.description: A loving family that believes in helping others.

teams.name: Dalat - Vietnam
teams.loan_because: It's a way of paying back what we have owed.
teams.description: We have been helped to succeed; we want you to succeed too.

teams.name: Australia
teams.loan_because:
Australians all let us rejoice
for we are young and free,    -   
We've heard the call of nations wide,
How can we let this be?    -   
We'll share our wealth,
We'll make the change,
We'll help to set them free   -   
From us to them
and back again, 
As one we all shall be      - 

(Thanks to member Jean for this one)

Find us on Facebook at http://www.facebook.com/group.php?gid=97953452142
teams.description: Kiva Loaners in Australia

teams.name: Bluffdale Bulldogs
teams.loan_because: WE want to engage our students and school community in learning the great lessons gained from helping others less fortunate than us. WE lend because We can!!
teams.description:
Students, teachers and families belonging to a generous community
that want to lift others out of poverty.

teams.name: Rice University
teams.description: We are students, alumni, staff, and faculty of Rice University.

teams.name: KimRowTrg - the group with not enough vowels
teams.loan_because: we're inspired by the entrepreneurial spirit!
teams.description: Two families! Three last names! Too hot to handle. Too cold to hold.

teams.name: Friends of Bob Harris
teams.loan_because:
After stumbling into a job as a luxury travel writer, I saw so much poverty that I decided to turn those paychecks into Kiva loans. Then I visited a bunch of clients, who were amazing, and I've written a book about it called "The International Bank of Bob" (Walker/Bloomsbury, March 5, 2013).

I hope the book will get more people to feel a greater understanding of Kiva, a better appreciation of the role of microfinance, and most of all, more connected to the rest of the world.
teams.description: People who realize that if we switched places with the recipients, they'd loan to us just as happily.  So, fair's fair.

teams.name: Amy Poehler's Smart Girls
teams.loan_because: You change the world one kindness at a time.
teams.description: Amy Poehler's Smart Girls knows there is still inequality all over the world. The basis of that inequality is that you are being denied the ability to be yourself. We must all be be able to make choices that can lead to a better life. Micro-loans make choices available.

teams.name: Kiva Lutherans
teams.loan_because: We love our neighbors as ourselves.
teams.description: Lutherans and allies of all walks of life. All are welcome here.

teams.name: St. Casimir
teams.loan_because: We want to share our great blessings with others.
teams.description: Super cool. Super smart.

teams.name: Cheeseheads For Change
teams.loan_because: If you give a man a fish, you feed him for a day.  Now in the modern world, you can give that same man a loan to buy a fishing pole, he catches fish with his new pole to feed his family, his community improves because of his financial success, he pays the loan back, and  you can re-loan that money again to help someone else buy a fishing pole . . . wait, that sounds like a conspiracy by the Rapala Corporation to sell more fishing equipment, what are we supporting here ;-)
teams.description: Our Kiva lending team is a non-political group consisting of Green Bay Packers fans lovingly known as Cheeseheads, and anyone who lives in or has ties to the great state of Wisconsin and is interested in making the world a better place.

for we are young and free,    -   
We've heard the call of nations wide,
How can we let this be?    -   
We'll share our wealth,
We'll make the change,
We'll help to set them free   -   
From us to them
and back again, 
As one we all shall be      - 

(Thanks to member Jean for this one)

Find us on Facebook at http://www.facebook.com/group.php?gid=97953452142
teams.description: Kiva Loaners in Australia

teams.name: KapustHopkinsMianoMonasteriSeinbacher
teams.loan_because: We believe that people have enormous capacity to help themselves if given just a little bit of support.

teams.name: HP
teams.loan_because:
This is a unique opportunity for HP employees globally to actively participate in driving HP Living Progress by supporting thousands of entrepreneurs around the world who need access to capital to start or grow their business. HP Living Progress is the framework for how we do business. Itâ€™s how we use our people and technologies to create a world where everyone has the opportunity to progress. 

Through this innovative collaboration with Kiva and the HP Company Foundation we can help ensure that entrepreneurs around the world achieve their dreams.
teams.description: Our team is committed to changing a million lives, and helping to end extreme poverty, one loan at a time.

teams.name: Stuff You Should Know from HowStuffWorks.com

teams.loan_because: We are out and proud and know what it is like to face barriers. We are privileged to help our entrepreneurs achieve their own equality. We thank our friends who join us in our loans & in supporting GLBT rights.
teams.description: We are gay, lesbian, bisexual, transgender, homosexual, and heterosexual people from all over the world.

teams.name: Kiva San Francisco
teams.loan_because: a little goes a long way.

teams.name: The Art of Living
teams.loan_because: We are committed to an equitable, just world society wherein all citizens can properly provide for themselves regardless of gender, location, and education.
teams.description:
The Art of Living is a multi-faceted, not-for-profit educational and humanitarian NGO with a presence in over 140 countries.

We are engaged in diverse initiatives aimed at uplifting humanity by bringing peace at the level of the individual, society, nation and world as a whole.

teams.name: Team Obama
teams.loan_because: We understand that our combined efforts through Kiva will help make this world a much better place!
teams.description: http://www.npr.org/templates/story/story.php?storyId=127545645

teams.name: New Community
teams.loan_because: Helping people out of poverty seems like a pretty OK thing to do.
teams.description: A community of people in Spokane, WA who are trying to get to know Jesus.

teams.name: Building Learning Communities
teams.loan_because: We can make a difference and bring "meaning" to the classroom.
teams.description:
In 2008, Alan invited Jessica Flannery, the co-founder of Kiva, to present at BLC. Jessica told a very touching story of why she wanted to help the working poor. Since that time, the Building Learning Communitiesâ€™ team has loaned $10.385.00 to struggling entrepreneurs around the world. We would like to invite you to help grow our team and have even more impact.

Kiva is a non-profit website that allows you to lend as little as $25 to a specific low-income entrepreneurs around the world. You choose who to lend to - whether a baker in Afghanistan, a goat herder in Uganda, a farmer in Peru, a restaurateur in Cambodia or a tailor in Iraq - and as they repay the loan, you get your money back. 

By joining our lending team, we can work together to alleviate poverty.

teams.name: UCONN IDC Alumni & Friends
teams.whereabouts: Rogers Hall, University of Connecticut , Storrs, CT USA & the world
teams.loan_because: We have experienced the power of how community can influence and change lives.
teams.description: We are a group of alumni and friends who came to know each other at the Intentional Democratic Community an experiment in community living at the University of Connecticut from 1974-1983.

teams.name: Connecticut
teams.loan_because: As one of the richest states in one of the most prosperous nations, we choose to share what God has blessed us with.
teams.description: Connecticut is a small state in the Northeast part of the United States. We are made up of diverse people from all walks of life and care deeply about the human condition.

teams.name: Possiblities
teams.description: To the world you might be just one person: but to one person you may be the world.

teams.name: Tiana and Nathan's Wedding
teams.loan_because: We're happy to celebrate our wedding by introducing our families and friends to the exciting possibilities of microfinance.

We want to provide a strong motivation to DownloadHelper developers to work even harder on new features.

We think we can make a difference.
teams.description: This lending team replaces the donations made to Video DownloadHelper authors to sustain the development of this free software.

teams.description: We are a group of people affected by  life-threatening and critical health conditions, joining together to help others around the world.

teams.name: Team Geo Ex
teams.loan_because: GeoEx is committed to living up to our responsibility of taking care of the places that have touched, inspired, and given our staff and clients so much joy.
teams.description: One of the pioneers in adventure travel, GeoEx offers a varied roster of overland expeditions, treks, and expeditionary voyages. GeoEx  operates worldwide and specializes in destinations that are difficult or impossible to reach on one's own.

teams.name: Ashleys and Company
teams.loan_because: It's so easy!

teams.name: Thailand
teams.loan_because:
We are the fortunate in this world that have the ability to help the working poor rise from poverty and perhaps enjoy a bit of happiness in their lives. 

With Kiva members' help these brothers and sisters, our fellow humans, have been given a ray of hope that only they can build upon for a brighter future.
teams.description: We have a very passionate core group of members who make consistent loans.  Join us today and set Thailand as your team choice.   Let's live up to the slogan "Amazing Thailand" with our generous lending activities.

teams.name: Ashleys and Company
teams.loan_because: It's so easy!

teams.name: Team Virginia
teams.loan_because: We give new meaning to the phrase "Commonwealth of Virginia."  We Virginians are thrilled to pool our common resources to help entrepreneurs all over the world as they improve their lives and their communities.
teams.description:
From the Appalachian Mountains to Virginia Beach (and equally welcoming of members outside the state), we are enthusiastic Kiva lenders privileged to have ties to the great state of Virginia.

teams.name: Atheists, Agnostics, Skeptics, Freethinkers, Secular Humanists and the Non-Religious
teams.loan_because: We care about human beings and understand that it takes people to help people.
teams.description:
We are one human family, and we know that people can do good without believing in a god.

The Plus sign in the A+ Team logo reflects the fact that the team comprises Atheists, PLUS Agnostics, Skeptics, Freethinkers, Secular Humanists, and Non-Religious members.  A+ is also a symbol of excellence.

teams.name: Physician Assistant Students!
teams.loan_because: We want to reach out to those in need, we want to help our fellow man contribute to their community and economy and we want to make dreams happen.
teams.description: We are medical students in a Physician Assistant program in America (in the state of Connecticut) who are hardworking, generous and open-hearted individuals.  The students who attend our school want to work in all fields of medicine and we want to make a difference in the world!  We must consider all aspects of the health of an individual, including their mind, body, and spirit  to accomplish that goal.  The loans we distribute will go toward bettering the lives of wonderful people from all over the world by supporting their dreams.

teams.name: hi5 Community on Kiva!
teams.loan_because: â€œKivaâ€™s principles of entrepreneurship, serving a global community, and leveraging the power of crowds are very complementary to hi5â€™s mission, so it seems only natural that we join them in the fight to help eradicate poverty in many parts of the developing world,â€ said Ramu Yalamanchi, CEO of hi5. â€œBy linking our user base with the profiles of Kiva entrepreneurs, we are connecting a diverse group of people who want to change our world for the better and ensure the right resources exist to do it.â€
teams.description: Headquartered in San Francisco, hi5 is one of the worldâ€™s largest and fastest growing social networks and mobile web networks. Our focus is to empower our users to build and maintain connections between friends and family online. With over 56 million unique visitors every month, hi5 is a top 20 website globally and the number one social network in 31 countries across Latin America, Europe, Asia and Africa. The service is available in 37 languages, delivering localized content and applications to users worldwide.

teams.name: Team CANADA
teams.loan_because:
So little means so much. And because we are so fortunate to be able to lend with the luxury of not worrying about whether we ever see that money again, while the clients borrow with the hope and determination that they will be able to repay, and improve their lives along the way.

Check out fundraising loans already being supported by Team Canada:
http://www.kiva.org/team/team_canada/loans?status=fundRaising
teams.description: We're Canadian, eh?

teams.name: Pet Projects
teams.loan_because: "Manâ€™s proper estate is an upright posture, an intransigent mind and a step that travels unlimited roads.  Productive work is the process by which manâ€™s consciousness controls his existence, a constant process of acquiring knowledge and shaping matter to fit oneâ€™s purpose, of translating an idea into physical form, of remaking the earth in the image of oneâ€™s values. Your work is yours to choose, and the choice is as wide as your mind."
